title: Music Player- Musiq X
description:
Music Player is the best Music player for android.
Please Note: This is a music player, not a music downloader .
It is a simple yet stylish music player for android.
La Musique is one of the most beautiful music app featuring a blurry / blur  theme or glassy / glass theme  and minimalist  design.
Key Features:
# Thousand of radios from all world
# Create Playlist and Save them(from "now playing" screen)
# Tag Editor(supporting mp3 ,wav and other audio formats)
# 5 band beautiful Equalizer with Bass Boost and Virtualizer to listen to your Music
# Browse and play music by songs,album,artist,playlist  and folders
# Browse your songs by folder.
# Elegant and beautiful User interface.
# Multi- select to play,queue or delete your music
# Sort your songs by more than 5 ways.
This Music app features the most modern yet classical interface.The style of this Music app is simply elegant.
It  lets you manage your music very easily and effectively with Multi -select option to play the songs and now there is an option to manage your music via folder view as well. La Musique - Music is becoming one of the most successful and popular music player available in the android market.
This music Player supports mp3,wav ,flac  and many other such audio formats.
Listen to your favorite music on the most elegant and beautiful user interface.
Control the sound of the songs with  a power and beautiful 5 band equalizer.
It is based on artists ,albums,songs,playlist etc.(Supporting wav , mp3, flac and many other such formats)
The perfect animations and minimalist  design has a soothing effect on you.
We will be upgrading the UI of the lock screen and will improve the equalizer as we have been requested to do so. We will also improve the playlist feature and make it more intuitive.
Currently you can add songs to a playlist and add it to the now playing list.
You can even multi select songs to add it to now playing list and save it to a playlist of your choice.
We are working on the app to provide you with   genre view  as well as improving  lock screen controls.
You can totally create new playlist too from the now playing list and album,songs,artist screen. Using this music player, you can create playlist very easily.
Play songs from where ever you want,like song list album list,artist list,playlist etc.
This music player is Free and Good reviews are motivating me to improve this music app regularly based on your positive feedback.
This Audio Player  is still in Beta and  is under development so If you find a bug or if the player crashes make sure you that  let us know (and give a change to fix it) before you give us a bad review.
If you have a feature to request or a bug to report ,please submit a request at : ankitsrivastava0193@gmail.com
We respond to every email.
Thank you  :)
To hear the latest news follow me on www.facebook.com/IamAnkitSrivastava.Entrepreneur/
All images are used from www.unsplash.com which is a royalty free collection of stock images.
Open sourceLibraries used
Ray Arc menu https://github.com/daCapricorn/ArcMenu
lazylist https://github.com/thest1/LazyList
quick Action  view
https://github.com/lorensiuswlt/NewQuickAction
Dragsort ListView
https://github.com/bauerca/drag-sort-listview
Crouton
https://github.com/keyboardsurfer/Crouton
Ecogallery https://github.com/falnatsheh/EcoGallery
Thank you for trying out this beautiful music player. This is definitely the best music player that you can try for free.
